Ort::P3OrtBase Class Reference

An Precision-Level 3 (P3) ONNXRuntime (Ort) Base class object. This class object instantiates a Precision Level 3 Ort Session which takes a typical ONNX model used for solely object detection and runs an inference engine. More...

using DataOutputType = std::pair< float *, std::vector< std::int64_t > >

Detailed Description

An Precision-Level 3 (P3) ONNXRuntime (Ort) Base class object. This class object instantiates a Precision Level 3 Ort Session which takes a typical ONNX model used for solely object detection and runs an inference engine.
